tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces
Interface IRendererController

public interface IRendererController

IRendererController is the common interface for controlling ad renderers.

Method Summary
 void processEvent(java.lang.String type)
          Pass the event to ad renderer.
 void processEvent(java.lang.String type, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> extraInfo)
          See also processEvent(String).
 

Method Detail

processEvent

void processEvent(java.lang.String type)
Pass the event to ad renderer.

Parameters:
type - name of the event

Available event:
EVENT_AD_CLICK - click on the ad

processEvent

void processEvent(java.lang.String type,
                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> extraInfo)
See also processEvent(String).

Parameters:
type - name of the event.

Available event:
EVENT_AD_MEASUREMENT - measurement triggered

extraInfo - additional information need to be processed by AdManager. Available keys:

- INFO_KEY_CONCRETE_EVENT_ID Required when the eventName is EVENT_AD_MEASUREMENT.
use this key to specify which measurement event is triggerd.
